fields.name: media_id
fields.description: A unique identifier of a multimedia file within a project.

fields.name: deployment_id
fields.description: The unique identifier of the deployment this observation belongs to. Foreign key to `deployment:deployment_id`.

fields.name: event_id
fields.description: A unique identifier of an event within a project. Events are what project researchers or software have defined as independent occasions, containing one or more multimedia files (e.g. a single video or a sequence of consecutive images).

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Date and time when the multimedia file was recorded, as an ISO 8601 formatted string in UTC (e.g. `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ`).

fields.name: file_location
fields.description: Url or a relative path to a multimedia file. Additional information on how to access this file is provided in a package-level metadata.
